short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support buttons on your dictation microphone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support of microphone buttons through the USB HID interface.

What's new in 0.2.4.2:
- Added support for other BRIT domains.

What's new in 0.2.4.1:
- Added support of Philips SpeechMike Pro LFH3200.

What's new in 0.2.4.0:
- Added support of Philips SpeechMike Premium LFH 3500.
- Fixed bug with buttons not working at the first time.

What's new in 0.2.3.4:
- Added support of Nuance Powermic II & III

What's new in 0.2.3.0:
- Disabled key combinations due to unpredictable behaviour - may be supported in next updates
- Added "Stop" button support for Phillips SpeechMike Classic

What's new in 0.2.2:
- Added logging for microphones that will be supported in the future
